originalText.text: Not a place where good business is conducted. I brought in a Xbox console to get fixed the guy said heâ€™ll give it to the technician and heâ€™ll give me a call in 2 hours. Two days later no call I had to physically go to the store for them to tell me the guy isnâ€™t here but he will give you a call. A few days later still no call, so I go back to the store the guy tells me what the problem is and how much itâ€™s going to cost to fixed and said itâ€™ll be ready tomorrow. Two days pass no call no communication nothing. I go back to store and say hey Iâ€™m here to pick up my Xbox, not only was my system and wires carelessly miss placed the guy had to ask me what I gave him because he didnâ€™t remember,the guy then says what the problem was again and said they wasnâ€™t able to fix it. I asked him when was he going to tell me all this and his answer was he was busy and he told the boss to tell me. Not a professional operation!

originalText.text: The guy was really respectful and has good prices my phone screen for was messed up and had flashing lights . Afterwards he fixed it so i can Actually use it again . Apple wanted to charge me 200 for a new screen and he charged me only 110. Better deals and no appointments needed definitely recommend coming here

originalText.text: Quick service. Prices are reasonable. Cash-only establishment!

originalText.text:
El peor negocio! No se puede recomendar.

The worst computer repair shop I have ever visited. My computer only needed a new battery and Emerson had my computer for 2 WEEKS but never fixed it (I have so many missing screws and part of the motherboard broken just to remove a screw; that's incompetence). They had unbelievable stories that they ordered the battery from Amazon and still had not received it...I took my computer to another more reliable business and they fixed it in 1 DAY and for much cheaper. Take your electronics (computers & phones) to more reputable businesses. These "positive" reviews are not honest, they're lies.
